name: 3x3 Eyes: Kyuusei Koushu
overview: 3x3 Eyes: Kyuusei Koushu is an adventure game on Playstation which is based on the universe of manga and anime 3x3 Eyes. Yakumo, a Japanese teenager, is the son of a famous adventurer who died of a mysterious accident during a trip to Tibet. He meets Pai, a girl who knew her father and belongs to an ancient race of immortal demons called Sanjiyan. Together they will seek to make human Pai despite the dangers!
